post.body: BTW everyone, the tree was in the driveway, not inside, wen it happened...
What a coincidence. I took r xmas stuff dwn 2day 2! Billy set r tree on fire(he sed accident) I think his curiosity got the best of him tho.
Spent a bunch of time at Grandma's today..n bringin stuff to Shelly's garage sale...just got done ordering gma's dtv converter box :)
Michael, I remember those maps! wow...I always wondered where you came up with those...
1st day back @ work in 10 days, can't make myself work, instead of play on the net..lots of things reminding me of Grandpa today:( sad day.
